# progressImage

**Instance Property**

An image to use for the portion of the progress bar that’s filled.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var progressImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you provide a custom image, the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIProgressView/progressTintColor] property is ignored.

## Configuring the progress bar

- **progressViewStyle**: The current graphical style of the progress view.
- **progressTintColor**: The color shown for the portion of the progress bar that’s filled.
- **trackTintColor**: The color shown for the portion of the progress bar that isn’t filled.
- **trackImage**: An image to use for the portion of the track that isn’t filled.
